document.full_text: michael ignatieff, who is running for prime minister for the liberal party, spent most of his adult life outside canada and has yet to closely connect with average canadians.
document.title: the saturday profile: looking to lead canada, and for a little name recognition
lines_and_colors: michael ignatieff, who is running for prime minister for the liberal party, spent most of his adult life outside canada and has yet to closely connect with average canadians.
